name: @aliceo2/qc
description: O2 Quality Control Web User Interface

scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run mocha
scripts.postinstall: if [[ ${NODE_ENV} == "production" ]]; then echo 'export QCGUI_ROOT=`pwd` && cd node_modules/@aliceo2/qc && npm start ${QCGUI_ROOT}/config.js' > ./../../../start; chmod +x ./../../../start; if [ ! -f ./../../../config.js ]; then cp config-default.js ./../../../config.js; fi; fi

author: Vladimir Kosmala
